column4: When I'm installing and selecting partitions manually, I select /dev/sda1 to install the bootloader on but when I reboot it doesn't load GRUB
Falcon: So I'll have /dev/sda1 mounted at /, /dev/sda2 as swap
it needs to go on the mbr (master boot record), which then passes things on to each partition, sda1, sda2 ...
